document.full_text: video of czech president vaclav klaus admiring a ceremonial pen during a state visit to chile, and then attempting to slip it into his pocket without anyone noticing, has gone viral.
document.title: the lede: the czech president pockets a pen
lines_and_colors: video of czech president vaclav klaus admiring a ceremonial pen during a state visit to chile, and then attempting to slip it into his pocket without anyone noticing, has gone viral.
